attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement for all elligable voters to vote at general elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ballot forms would then also include a box allowing the voter to choose other than listed candidates, such as "no suitable candidates" and "Don't mind". This would give an accurate reflection on the publics democratic view of who should be governing the country. When  no one party has more than 50% of the votes; parties would be advised to choose new candidates for a new election, to be held in the same format as described.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
